title: Prohibits inmate of a correctional facility serving a life without parole sentence from having visitation under the family reunion program
summary: Prohibits an inmate in a correctional facility serving a life without parole sentence or who has been convicted of a sex offense as defined in articles 130 and 263 of the penal law, from being eligible for conjugal visitation under the family reunion program.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to visitation of inmates under the family reunion program
